title: disconnecting for no apparent reason
body:
well it started like a month ago, not that I changed anything, I just started disconnecting the moment the game starts, not during game room or loading screen but the moment the game starts I get kicked out and it just writes reconnecting. I've tried disabling ipv6 and I've tried vpns and nothing works. any help please ?

ps.
I've tried deleting lol and installing it back again
my internet connection is fine

replies.body: Hmmmm that is rather odd. Since all your connections leading up to the actual game itself starting, it kinda make me think something is blocking you once you get into the game. I'd try checking out your firewalls and other backgrounds programs to really make sure that isn't the case, but also hit up the other steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover your other bases too.
